Name: Meu Mundo
About the game: More than a game, a new way of seeing the world! By managing the resources and directing the beginning of a civilization you will have the experience of controlling the destiny of a whole world, the resources are limited, the inhabitants have the autonomy to carry out the activities independent of their intervention, after all they will try to survive to the maximum in this world new.
Meta Title: Meu Mundo: Aug 5, 2019, Tiago Portella and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Meu Mundo? Check out the release date (Aug 5, 2019), developer insights from Tiago Portella, and a complete game summary.
